text: Emerson, Lake and Powell is the debut and only studio album by Emerson, Lake and Powell. The album was released in 1986.The Rough Guide to Rock, ed. Peter Buckley (London: Rough Guides; London; New York: Distributed by the Penguin Group, 2003), p. 339 ==References== Category:1986 albums
title: Emerson, Lake and Powell (album)
